title: Updating Interface 0 kbps
body:
I have been trying to install League of legends for the past few  days. I did multiple reinstallation but everytime it got stuck at the interface updating. It start off for awhile with pretty decent download speeds but after like a few seconds later, it got back to 0 kbps and it stays there forever.
I really need some help with this.
Is there any other way I can download without using this installer?
Any help is appreciated. Cheers

replies.body:
Hey Hopee,

Sorry to hear about your patching issues. Please try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Patching Issues**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions) thread and let me know if the error persists.
